import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Select from 'react-select' import { championData, championDataType } from './types/championData'; const App = () => { const [ player, setPlayer ] = useState(championData[28]) const onClick = () => { const newPlayer = championData.filter(({year}) => year === 2022 ).find(({tournament}) => tournament === "全仏オープン" ) || player setPlayer(newPlayer) console.log(player) } const yearOptions = [ {value: 2015, label: "2015"}, {value: 2016, label: "2016"}, {value: 2017, label: "2017"}, {value: 2018, label: "2018"}, {value: 2019, label: "2019"}, {value: 2020, label: "2020"}, {value: 2021, label: "2021"}, {value: 2022, label: "2022"}, {value: 2023, label: "2023"}, {value: 2024, label: "2024"} ] const tournamentOptions = [ {value: 'australianOpen', label: '全豪オープン'}, {value: 'frenchOpen', label: '全仏オープン'}, {value: 'wimbledon', label: 'ウィンブルドン'}, {value: 'usOpen', label: '全米オープン'} ] const onChangeYear = (o: string) => {return o} return (

グランドスラムの優勝者を検索するアプリです。
開催年と大会を選択してください。

開催年

{`${player.year}年　${player.tournament}`}

{player.name}{`（${player.country}）`}

決勝戦ハイライト
); } export default App;
